name: 9 to 5 Nightmare
description:
Hello, this is a roughly/late second Game Jam that I've participated in! Really excited I was able to make a second one and looking forward to the reviews!

Description
Your boss has asked you to pick up the mess in the office once again. Saying that this is punishment for not meeting the  weekly quota of emails! 

Be careful your fellow coworkers are pulling a prank and are trying to scare you with a surprise due to Halloween being around the corner....

Controls:

W, A, S, D to move around while your mouse used to look around.
